caption.p: Integrated MDGC-GC×GC analysis of Agarwood ( A. malaccensis) oxygenated terpenes. GC-FID 1D chromatogram ( Ai) and the expansion of the target region ( Aii) to be heart-cut. MDGC chromatograms showing the heart-cut (H/C) region in the 2D TOFMS detection ( Bi) and 1D FID detection ( Bii). GC×GC-TOFMS chromatogram ( C) showing the comprehensive separation of the target region. Source: adapted with permission from Yan et al. [ 12].
